home.title: Professional Sewing Production
home.subtitle: Quality clothing and textile products made to order
home.aboutText: We are a professional sewing production with many years of experience. We specialize in manufacturing quality clothing and textile products for various areas of life.
home.qualityText1: Our production is equipped with modern equipment and works with experienced craftsmen. We guarantee high quality execution and adherence to production deadlines.
home.qualityText2: Each product undergoes quality control at all stages of production, ensuring excellent results for our clients.
home.service1Description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements.
home.service2Description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging.
home.service3Description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings.
home.service4Description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures.
home.service5Description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer elements.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The development path of our production
history.introText: Adonis is a Ukrainian sewing factory that since 2002 has been creating women's outerwear that combines comfort, elegance and impeccable fit. We know how important it is for every woman — regardless of size — to feel confident and beautiful. That's why our collections cover a wide size range — from 42 to 80. Our main qualification is the production of women's outerwear. At the same time, we have experience in developing men's collections and children's models, which allows us to flexibly implement various partner requests. For rational use of resources and minimization of production waste, we give fabrics a second life. We use leftover materials after sewing main Adonis collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases for beauty master tools. This approach allows us not only to care for the environment, but also to create useful products with unique design. We work with love for details: from cutting to finishing, from fabric selection to hardware. Our jackets, coats and vests are the result of experience, craftsmanship and modern technologies, including our own embroidery and quilting services. Adonis is more than just production. It's a team that understands that every product is a story that combines style, quality and care.
history.cooperationText: TM Adonis invites wholesale buyers to cooperate and offers them to replenish their assortment with goods that invariably enjoy increased demand from customers!

adonisCollection.title: ADONIS Own Collection
adonisCollection.description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements. We offer wholesale sales of ADONIS collections for stores, showrooms and online platforms.

brandProduction.title: Production Under Your Brand
brandProduction.description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging. We have extensive experience in outsourcing and provide a complete production cycle, modern equipment, quality control at every stage, confidentiality and strict adherence to deadlines.

gerberCutting.title: Automated Cutting on Gerber Complex
gerberCutting.description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings. Perfect solution for brands and manufacturers who need quality cutting without waste.

quilting.title: Fabric Quilting
quilting.description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures, creating spectacular solutions for outerwear collections, accessories and interior textiles. We work with different types of fabrics and fillers.
features: Different types of fabrics and fillers

embroidery.title: Embroidery on Any Types of Fabrics
embroidery.description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer or artistic elements. Modern German equipment ensures perfect accuracy. Maximum working field 60×70 cm. We embroider on any types of fabrics with impeccable quality and attention to every detail.
